name: Red VS Red
description:
Red VS Red it´s a local multiplayer shooter for two players in which you have to avoid being the first to fall in lava, while shooting at the floor of the opponent to fall first.

Excitement in fast games and desire to have a good time are what it takes to play Red vs Red!

CONTROLS: 

Player 1  uses the mouse to aim, and the left click to shoot. Use the W, A, S, D keys to move. and Space to jump.

Player two uses the left gamepad to move the camera and the right one to move. To jump, press "A" and to shoot, "RT".

MEMBERS OF THE TEAM:

Almudena Fernández, Diana Montoro,  Luis Sagastibelza

Enjoy it! ~~^^
